posts.post_content: Does this card affect damage dealt to Planeswalkers? Both the "half damage dealt to player" and the "deal damage to Planeswalker instead of player" are replacement effects. Can the player choose do the half replacement and then the Planeswalker replacement or is there some ordering that forces the Planeswalker replacement to happen first?
